Grains are a type of food that is part of the grain food group. This group includes foods such as wheat, rice, oats, barley, corn, rye, millet, and quinoa.

The grain food group includes foods made from wheat, rice, oats, cornmeal, barley, and other cereal grains. Examples of grain foods include bread, pasta, oatmeal, breakfast cereals, tortillas, and grits.
